channel.title: Projects on Koen van der Borght
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Koen van der Borght

item.title: Log Interpreter Tool
item.description:
A local log viewer for Serilog-based systems that supports:

  • Live filtering and level toggling
  • Syntax highlighting and clickable exceptions
  • Exception grouping and analysis

Built with .NET and WPF. Designed for engineers who want full control over their log debugging workflows.

item.title: PipelineBoost
item.description:
PipelineBoost is a service and toolset aimed at optimizing build and release pipelines for software teams.

We focus on:

  • Build time reduction
  • Environment-specific caching
  • Cross-repository coordination in Azure DevOps

Currently in early validation phase.
